subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Sunderland took a gamble by hiring the inexperienced and outspoken Paolo Di Canio as its manager, giving him the tough task of ensuring that the relegation-threatened team retains its Premier League status.
snippet: Sunderland took a gamble by hiring the inexperienced and outspoken Paolo Di Canio as its manager, giving him the tough task of ensuring that the relegation-threatened team retains its Premier League status.
